subject: UN Compensation Department
body:
UN Compensation Department
405 East 42nd Street, New York
United States of America.
Attn:  Beneficiary,
Why have you abandoned your long overdue funds pending for payment through an ATM as you indicated? Do you wish to TERMINATE your funds? You have 24 hours to respond to this email to avoid your funds TERMINATED.
Yours sincerely,
Don Callahan, LLP
Director United States Reconciliation Committee

subject: Re:   UN Compensation Department
body:
Hello Don Callahan,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, your message has taken me by surprise. I wasn't aware that I had any funds pending for payment through an ATM. Could you please provide more details about this? How did this situation come about?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Christopher

subject: UN COMPENSATION DEPARTMENT TO CHRISTOPHER
body:
ATTN: Christopher

How are you today hope all is well with you and family?. You may not
comprehend the reason for this email being sent to you. The Secretary
General of the United Nations directed me to get in touch with you
regarding our first quarter annual meeting for 2024.

We receive a confirmation that you where among the scam victims, because of
this Secretary-General  of United Nations has agreed to reward and
compensate you and also to pay other victims from your country who has
being Victims of Internet scam, The United Nations has decided to pay you (
Seven Hundred and fifty Thousand United States Dollars Only) each. You are
listed and approved for this payment as one of the scammed victims to be
paid this amount. Also this compensation award extended to victims of
Hurricane, earthquake, War displaced and Aged. Anyone who is a victim of
the above mentioned is liable to benefit from this compensation exercise.
We found your name in our list and that is why we are contacting you,This
has been agreed upon and has been signed. Therefore,we are happy to inform
you that an arrangement has been concluded to effect your payment as soon
as possible in our bid to be transparent and make the world a better place.

However, it is our pleasure to inform you that your ATM Card Number; 4083
0521 0025 0080 has been approved and upgraded in your favor. Meanwhile your
Secret Pin Number will be available as soon as you confirm to us the
receipt of your ATM CARD. The ATM Card Value is US$750,000.00. Only. You
are advised that a maximum withdrawal value of US$5,000.00 is permitted
daily.And we are duly inter-switched and you can make withdrawal in any
location of the ATM Center of your choice nearest to you anywhere in the
world.

We have also concluded delivery arrangements with our accredited courier
service Company to oversee the delivery of the ATM Card to you without any
further delay. You are hereby advised to send your full Names and Your
direct Mobile number/your correct mailing address to the Director ATM SWIFT
CARD Department, where you want him to send the ATM CARD to you.

Yours sincerely,

Don Callahan, LLP
Director United States Reconciliation Committee

subject: Re: UN COMPENSATION DEPARTMENT TO CHRISTOPHER
body:
Hello Don Callahan,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, your message is quite intriguing! It's not every day that one receives an email from the United Nations. 

I'm curious about this annual meeting you mentioned in the first quarter. Could you tell me more about it? What was discussed during this meeting and how does it relate to my situation?

Also, I'm a bit confused about the ATM card. How exactly does it work? Is there a specific bank I need to use it with or can I use it anywhere?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Christopher

subject: UN COMPENSATION DEPARTMENT TO CHRISTOPHER
body:
Attn: Christopher

Mail received with the content well noted. At the last annual meeting of
the first quarter, the Secretary General of the United Nations agreed to
provide compensation to you and others who suffered from internet scams and
natural disasters. You have been designated as one of the scammed victims
to receive this payment.


Note that your ATM Card Number; 4083 0521 0025 0080 has been approved and
upgraded. Your Secret Pin Number will be accessible once you confirm
receipt of your ATM card with us. The ATM Card has an amount of
US$750,000.00 Only. It is important to note that you are allowed a daily
withdrawal of US$5,000.00. We are connected, so you can withdraw at the ATM
Center nearest to you anywhere in the world.

In order to expedite action immediately, it is necessary for you to provide
us with the information listed below.

Your receiving name:-
Your receiving Address:-
Your private telephone:-
A copy of your International Passport or Driver's License:-

As soon as we receive the above information. We shall load your
US$750,000.00 into your ATM MASTER CARD immediately and inform you of the
date of shipment to the receiving address you are going to provide as we
have made necessary arrangements with our accredited courier service
company for delivery of the ATM Card to you without any further delay

Yours sincerely,

Don Callahan, LLP
Director United States Reconciliation Committee

subject: Re: UN COMPENSATION DEPARTMENT TO CHRISTOPHER
body:
Hello Don Callahan,

Thank you for your email. It's quite surprising to hear about this, I must say! I wasn't aware that the United Nations had such a program in place. 

Could you please provide me with more information about this initiative? How was I selected as one of the victims? Also, could you explain how the ATM card works? Is it like a regular debit card?

I'm also curious about the daily withdrawal limit. Is there a reason why it's set at that specific amount?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Christopher
